abstract: Abraham Winkler and Pinchas Braver, both connected with Hasidic neighborhood watch group in Williamsburg section of Brooklyn, plead guilty in connection with 2013 assault on Taj Patterson, young black man who was mistaken for vandal by pair; agreement is expected to bring sentences of probation and community service rather than prison time.

headline.print_headline: Two Men Plead Guilty to an Attack in Brooklyn
headline.main: 2 Men Tied to Neighborhood Watch Group Plead Guilty to Attack

snippet: The men, linked to a Hasidic private security group, admitted their part in the 2013 beating of a man they suspected of vandalism in Williamsburg.
lead_paragraph: The men, linked to a Hasidic private security group, admitted their part in the 2013 beating of a man they suspected of vandalism in Williamsburg.
